# Issue #654
! cue cmd test
cmp stderr expect-stderr
-- x.cue --
package x

import (
	"tool/cli"
)

command: test: cli.Print & {
	text: "success"
}
-- expect-stderr --
cmd must be run as one of its subcommands: unknown subcommand "test"
Ensure commands are defined in a "_tool.cue" file.
Run 'cue help cmd' for known subcommands.
